Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Room extends Object implements Serializable
Model code for Room Contains contents like buff, de-buff (add-on) or pillars Has monster as guardian that player has to battle Track whether player has visited Has doors to the other rooms with access code in binary (Bit 0th for North, 1st for West, 2nd for South, 3rd for East) If bit 0th is 0, meaning door to the north is blocked. @author: Toan Nguyen
See Also:
